long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Force HTTPS: Automatic Secure Browsing
Browse with Confidence and Privacy

Force HTTPS is your essential Chrome extension for ensuring safe and encrypted web browsing. Automatically redirect to the HTTPS version of websites wherever possible, protecting your personal data and keeping your online activity secure.

Key Features
•	Automatic HTTPS Redirection
Seamlessly upgrade your connections to HTTPS for a secure and encrypted browsing experience on supported websites.
•	Enhanced Privacy Protection
Shield your sensitive data, including passwords and financial information, from hackers and eavesdroppers—especially on unsecured networks.
•	Security Alerts
Stay informed with real-time notifications when a website doesn't support HTTPS, so you can make safe browsing decisions.
•	Lightweight and Fast
Force HTTPS runs efficiently in the background without slowing down your browsing speed or affecting your device's performance.
•	Regular Updates
Stay secure with continuous updates that adapt to new websites and the latest security standards.

Why Choose Force HTTPS?
In a world where online security is paramount, Force HTTPS ensures every browsing session is protected. From safeguarding sensitive information to maintaining privacy on public Wi-Fi, this extension is a must-have for anyone who values secure and worry-free browsing.
Download Force HTTPS today and make secure browsing your default setting!
